forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. Northwest wind around 5 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun dips toward the horizon, Downtown San Francisco basks in the golden glow of a crisp winter afternoon, where the chill in the air is accompanied by a brightness that reveals the city in high definition. The forecast hints at temperatures that will flirt with the mid-sixties before letting the cool breeze from the northwest usher in the evening. Currently, the skyline stands proudly, its contours sharp against the rich blue sky, while the deepening twilight suggests a tranquil march toward a clear night.

There is no fog to obscure the view; instead, the lack of a marine layer allows the city’s beauty to shine, inviting residents to revel in the delights of the evening. As night approaches, temperatures will descend to about 49 degrees, so a light jacket might be wise against the biting chill. The calm winds, barely perceivable, suggest a serene outing; perhaps a leisurely evening stroll along the waterfront, where the twinkling lights of the bay dance in harmony with distant city sounds. Whether exploring the vibrant streets or indulging in the comforting embrace of a cozy café, it is undoubtedly a night to savor the distinctive charm that only San Francisco can offer.
